verbose_text: Recently, it has been shown that DISC1 regulates neurogenesis via modulating kinetochore attachment of NDEL1 / NDE1 during mitosis, demonstrating a critical role of the DISC1 / NDEL1 interaction in regulating mitosis of radial glial progenitors (RGPs), both in the developing mouse cortex in vivo and in human forebrain organoids from an individual with schizophrenia who carries a 4-bp deletion of DISC1 [XREF_BIBR].
